title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: Cognitive Load Assessment and Lexile Measurement Based on Text Complexity

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English reading proficiency and understanding of working memory
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can self-assess working memory load after reading texts at various Lexile levels
Learners can explain the correlation between text complexity and brain activity indicators (beta/alpha/theta waves)
Learners can apply methods for analyzing text difficulty and cognitive processing levels using digital tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
